section.section: An entity that engages a regulated lobbyist for the purpose of lobbying shall provide a signed authorization for the regulated lobbyist to act.
If the entity is a corporation, an authorized officer or agent, other than the regulated lobbyist, shall sign the authorization.

text.section:
The authorization to act required by subsection (a) of this section shall include:
the full legal name and business address of the entity and of the regulated lobbyist;
subject to subsequent modification, the period during which the regulated lobbyist is authorized to act; and
the proposal or subject on which the regulated lobbyist represents the entity.
